website_summaries.verdict: A good choice if you're looking for a simple clock that can dress up any outdoor space.
pros: Made of sturdy metal with an elegant, vintage design
Keeps accurate time even in very hot and cold temperatures
cons: Dark color and small size make this clock difficult to read from a distance

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty and looks good but here's a tip
customer_reviews.text: I bought both the clock and the thermometer. Both are heavy weight and solid. Looks good and am glad I bought them. But, both are difficult to see because the raised letters are the same color as the background. Picture is misleading. I am not very artsy craftsy but I bought a Sharpie Metallic Gold Paint Marker (not the ink) and painted over the numbers. Because they are raised it is very easy and took less than 10 minutes for each one. Now they both look great (they actually look like the picture) and you can actually tell the time/temp.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend it for a outdoor clock
customer_reviews.text: This is a very high quality outdoor clock made of Aluminum so it will not rust. We live right on the ocean in Northern Baja California and do get ocean moisture and high humidity at times. Other clocks we have had have all deteriorated and stopped working. I will do a update on this one in 6 months, but am sure from the heavy duty construction and water proof mechanism that this clock will last a long time. I highly recommend it for a outdoor clock!
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Item Received Does Not Match the Item I Ordered
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a "Whitehall Products Ivy Silhouette Clock, French Bronze," described as "used - with slightly damage to the box". Who does not like a good bargain to save some $$$. Except I did not received the described item. What I received was a tree of life combined clock and thermometer (see photo) that is broken and missing an important part. The item that I received is not even close to the photo of the Whitehall Products Ivy Silhouette Clock, French Bronze that I ordered. I have bough some items labeled as "used - with slight damage" from Amazon in the past and was very happy with what I received. Anyway, got a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Vic L.

customer_reviews.title: AZ Sun
customer_reviews.text: Had to re buy as the AZ sun is hard on them. Would have given a higher rating - but they don't last but a year in out climate. Some one posted to go over the numbers with a gold paint pen. I did that and it makes it so much easy to read.
customer_reviews.author: D. Moran

customer_reviews.title: Great looking clock, only ran for a year
customer_reviews.text: I have had this clock for a little over a year and it has worked well most of the year but has stopped working two months after a year. It looks nice, great to read, but it only lasted a year and now I put in battery after battery and it runs for a few days and stops. I was hoping when I paid for a little more expensive outdoor clock it would last longer than a year.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Pansing

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but stopped working - great customer service and now works
customer_reviews.text: Lovely and beautiful. I utilized the gold pen to enhance the letters. I love the look. AND THEN, the clock worked great for about 3 months, and now does not keep time. I changed the battery to no avail. I wonder if they will replace it? UPDATE: I called the manufacturer. They were VERY nice and sent me a new clock mechanism for free, with very easy to install instructions. The clock is back working again, fingers crossed.
customer_reviews.author: Per Chat

customer_reviews.title: I love this
customer_reviews.text: I did paint the numbers gold with the permanent gold marker like someone else suggested. Very glad I did made it much easier to see across my garden. It looks lovely.
customer_reviews.author: carolyn d.

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking.  Works well.  Battery even included
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking metal clock. It’s heavy. It looks more expensive then it is. I recommend it. It even came with a battery.
customer_reviews.author: Duane D. Bennett Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality but hard to read
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this clock except for one thing: it is hard to read at a distance because there is little contrast with the clock face. It is high quality, looks very classy, and is worth the price -- just don't expect to read the time from greater than 25 feet away.
customer_reviews.author: Big D

customer_reviews.title: great outdoor clock
customer_reviews.text: We have the clock (and matching thermometer) outside by our pool. Can't live without it!
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Pierce

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: This clock is perfect for our outdoor screened-in porch. It is beautiful, sturdy, and accurate. We bought it with the matching thermometer and the look great together side-by-side. I agree with other reviews that the numbers are hard to see but the hands of the clock aren't so it is still easy to tell the time. I like the blending in of the numbers so it isn't as obvious it's a clock.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed with how heavy the clock was, it should hold up outside for a long time. I wish it was a little larger and the hands were a little brighter, so you can see it better.
customer_reviews.author: deedee

customer_reviews.title: It Works
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. Works. The best thing is it isn't too big. We just wanted a clock to blend in and not be an eye sore
customer_reviews.author: William Pritchard

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, very well clock. We have had it for almost 5 years. It’s outside, on a covered porch. It is surprisingly accurate despite being exposed to all kinds of temperature. Very pleased, as well as by a matching thermometer.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of this outdoor clock. A great compliment to our outdoor decor.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Kel

customer_reviews.title: Purchased both the thermometer and clock and absolutely love them. Due to other comments
customer_reviews.text: Purchased both the thermometer and clock and absolutely love them. Due to other comments, I also purchased the metallic marker but after we saw them, we decided to leave as is. Great addition to our outside wall.
customer_reviews.author: Clarabee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this outdoor clock- looks great and very well made!
customer_reviews.author: C. A. Ter Haar

customer_reviews.title: Loved so much, bought two of them!
customer_reviews.text: I love this clock! I used a sharpie on the clock displayed on the outdoor fireplace. (thanks to the reviews I read before purchasing) I could not be happier ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Rawlings

customer_reviews.title: Looks great on patio.
customer_reviews.text: I got this clock for the pool patio and it looks great. Not too big either and has a great hook on the back that makes it very easy to mount.
customer_reviews.author: CatDaddy & Biatch

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my patio
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty clock. Great addition to my patio. I did paint the number so they are easier to see as suggested by other reviewers.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Rose

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Terrific addition to our patio. Beautiful and keeps good time.
customer_reviews.author: K. Graff

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It stopped working after a month. Junk for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus Saucier

customer_reviews.title: outdoor clock
customer_reviews.text: Wall clock works perfectly. The one we had previously lasted four years. Not bad being it was exposure to the elements.
customer_reviews.author: lillysmom

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: This clock won't keep the correct time and the minute hand is loose. Unfortunate because I really like the appearance. It's going back.
customer_reviews.author: P. A. Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: As others before, numbers had to be retouched with gold paint in order to make it stand out.
customer_reviews.author: JOSE

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after two months!
customer_reviews.text: After two months,this clock stopped working. Several new batteries later and it does not work. Definitely do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Steven J. Golightly

customer_reviews.title: perfect color & easy to read
customer_reviews.text: Just perfect-perfect size, perfect color & easy to read! Looks very expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Lady cr

customer_reviews.title: love it.
customer_reviews.text: Well made with a classic look. On our lanai...love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: My new patio clock is very nice and made real good. It looks really nice in my patio. I looked every where and this one is by far A good value. It is nice too because you can put it inside or out. I just LOVE it. Bonnie
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this clock!
customer_reviews.text: I was thrilled when I opened the box and found the beautiful clock that I had hoped for. Too bad it doesn't work. Don't even think about ordering this clock! I wish I would have taken other reviews into consideration before ordering.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Attractive But Hard to Read
customer_reviews.text: Was purchased as a outdoor pool clock. Smaller than I thought it would be and hard to read from a distance.
customer_reviews.author: Sandozamazon

customer_reviews.title: What Time is it?
customer_reviews.text: Love the way it looks. Unfortunately, it only worked for two months. It was stored for the winter and when I took it out this summer and put in a new battery---NOTHING. I thought that spending a bit more would have bought me a good, lasting product. It didn't. So now it is an ornament, but not a clock.
customer_reviews.author: Wiser One

customer_reviews.title: Great Looking and Accurate ... Buy the Sharpie Paint Pen!
customer_reviews.text: Clock looks and works great! Keeps accurate time. As suggested by other reviewers I accented the numbers and hour markers with a Sharpie Paint Pen which makes it infinitely more readable and enhances its appearance.We also purchased the companion thermometer as can be seen in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: RJT

customer_reviews.title: The clock is beautiful, but the photo shown when you order the ...
customer_reviews.text: The clock is beautiful, but the photo shown when you order the clock is MISLEADING. The photo shows both the clock and the thermometer, so I thought I was ordering both. Turns out, the $33.75 is only for the clock. When we got the delivery sans thermometer, I went back online and, sure enough, the heading says only "clock." The thermometer is an extra $46.68. Interestingly, the illustration on the thermometer page also shows BOTH the thermometer and the clock. Very misleading, the whole thing. That said, I went ahead and ordered the thermometer anyway, as we needed both and as the design is just what we need.
customer_reviews.author: SoCal John

customer_reviews.title: Attractive, inaccurate time keeping
customer_reviews.text: This is a very attractive clock that I have had on a covered patio for a year and a half. After six months it stopped keeping accurate time and is forever needing the battery changed. It is cheaply made and this week died for good. I would never buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty!! Steel solid!! Can be used for self defense if needed.
customer_reviews.text: Heavy Duty!! Steel solid!! Can be used for self defense if needed. Works as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Jshadle

customer_reviews.title: they replaced the clock with my choice which was super nice. Even though it was the incorrect clock ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered as a gift. Did not receive pictured clock. When seller was contacted, they replaced the clock with my choice which was super nice. Even though it was the incorrect clock they look a lot alike except for the letter B at the bottom of the one I received, it is really pretty. The seller was understanding and overall met my needs/expectations. I would buy from seller again.
customer_reviews.author: DeDee

customer_reviews.title: Worked well all winter outside
customer_reviews.text: The clock kept perfect time all winter through the below zero weather this past winter. The only thing is the numbers are a little hard to read, I painted them to bring about more contrast.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy P

customer_reviews.title: Clock stopped working after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Clockworks stopped working after 6 months. The whole thing is really nice looking, but the cheap mechanism means that we can't use it anymore. Like other buyers, I used a Sharpie to color the numbers. If you don't, their very difficult to see.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after one day
customer_reviews.text: It stopped working after just one day. However, my mom didn't tell me about it until after 2 months. Now it's just too late to return. I cannot find anyway to contact the seller from Amazon, so I am stuck with this junk now.
customer_reviews.author: Belinda

customer_reviews.title: Very sharp looking clock!
customer_reviews.text: Very sharp looking clock! And it has a nice weight to it, which we wanted because we are putting it out on our patio. If I had only one suggestion, it would be to make it in two sizes, as we cold have liked it to be bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie H

customer_reviews.title: A Beautiful, Sturdy Clock that Keeps Great Time
customer_reviews.text: I bought this clock to use in an outdoor summer kitchen. It is the perfect size, sturdy construction, easy to read, attractive and keeps great time. A quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Rick P.

customer_reviews.title: Great Outdor Clock
customer_reviews.text: Much better replacement for a cheaper plastic outdoor clock. Unlike other reviewers comments, I have no issue with reading the time due to lack of contracting colors on the numerals.
customer_reviews.author: C. Sovin

customer_reviews.title: Ivy sihouette clock
customer_reviews.text: This is a great quality item. So many compliments too. I def. highly recommend it. I have it out on my house on the deck area in full sun. Will always look new and not sun weathered.
customer_reviews.author: J.,

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Outdoor Clock
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an outdoor clock that had European Upscale Style and this size. I love this clock and it keeps time perfectly so far. It looks beautiful on my lanai and can be seen from all areas of my pool. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Judy O'Connor

customer_reviews.title: Outdoor Clock OK
customer_reviews.text: Loved the look of the clock, but the quality is questionable. The hands seemed very touchy and I am worried that they will not hold up as I had hoped. Find out next summer.
customer_reviews.author: jbw

customer_reviews.title: Looks great with wrought iron fence around the pool
customer_reviews.text: Clock is very attractive. Looks great with wrought iron fence around the pool. Keeps good time. Weather resistant.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Last one lasted 10 years.
customer_reviews.text: This is a replacement clock for one that lasted for 10 years. Reasonably accurate and attractive and unaffected by temperature extremes.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce M. Bury

customer_reviews.title: Terrible!
customer_reviews.text: This clock never worked. I couldn't return because it was past 30 days. Don't buy!
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Good, but with a shortcoming.
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking, but, as others have noted, the illustration is deceiving in that in the actual product, the numerals are barely visible because they are the same color as the background. I took the suggestion of others and applied a copper-colored nail polish to the hands, the numerals and to the tick marks closer to the center. Took only about 20 minutes to do, but made a world of difference. If you're willing to invest the time and effort to apply coloring, I highly recommend the clock. Otherwise, you'll be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: L. C. Scanlon

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works and looks great so far. Hanging outside on my patio.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Witherington

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice heavy duty clock. I absolutely love the look and was a great deal for a good price. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Whitehall Products Ivy Silhouette Clock, French Bronze
product_meta.description: Ivy Silhouette Clock, Color : French Bronze, Made in United States. Material type: Aluminum. Dimensions: 12" Diameter.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars93 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
specifications.Warranty Description: 1 year limited limited against manufacturer defect.
